title: FEAST Flutter App
description: A cross-platform mobile application designed to reduce food waste, generate recipes, and plan weekly meals, built with Flutter and Firebase.

title: WholeNotes Android App
description: A native Android application for rating and sharing songs, featuring cloud sync capabilities via Firebase.

title: Dino Game
description: A clone of Google's Dino game, featuring both an AI-powered mode trained using NEAT and a manual player mode.

title: Hangman
description: A PyQt6-based Hangman game featuring multiple game modes, an achievement system, and a large word database.

title: Music Tools
description: An all-in-one solution for music enthusiasts to organize and manage their collections.

title: Temple of Xibalba
description: A 3D temple treasure adventure game developed in Unity.

title: Largest Monotonic Island
description: A formal verification project using Dafny. Implemented and mathematically proved the correctness of a largest monotonic island.

title: Writing Tools
description: Contributed to this open-source project by implementing a Dark Mode and fixing critical UI/UX bugs to improve user experience.

title: Undercooked
description: A 2-player rival cooking prototype game made in Unity.

title: School Projects
description: A collection of various games and software created during my academic studies.

title: Achievement Watcher
description: A tool that displays game achievements tracked across my various game projects.
